hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo zypper ref sudo zypper up -y
# Install Python MongoDB Driver and its dependencies sudo zypper install -y git wget python-xml python-devel python-cffi openssl-devel libffi-devel gcc
# Install the build dependent packages wget https://bootstrap.pypa.io/ez_setup.py && sudo python ez_setup.py sudo easy_install pip==1.2.1
python -V pip --version
cd .. git clone git://github.com/mongodb/mongo-python-driver.git pymongo cd pymongo git checkout 3.6.1 sudo python setup.py install
# dependencies for mongoDB Server sudo zypper install -y wget net-snmp cyrus-sasl cyrus-sasl-plain cyrus-sasl-gssapi timezone
#Install the MongoDb Server wget https://repo.mongodb.com/zypper/suse/12/mongodb-enterprise/3.6/s390x/RPMS/mongodb-enterprise-server-3.6.1-1.suse12.s390x.rpm sudo rpm -Uvh mongodb-enterprise-server-3.6.1-1.suse12.s390x.rpm sudo mkdir -p db sudo /usr/bin/mongod --dbpath db & sleep 40s
# Run Tests export DB_IP=127.0.0.1 sudo -E python setup.py test
# Testing if installation is succesfull
#Expected output
echo -e " {u'_id': ObjectId('57ff15603761b4f8010b8c43'), u'company': u'IBM', u'language': u'python', u'project': u'MongoDB Driver', u'version': u'3.6.1'} {u'_id': ObjectId('5800d970c4834c169e1b5e8b'), u'line': 0} {u'_id': ObjectId('5800d970c4834c169e1b5e8c'), u'line': 1} {u'_id': ObjectId('5800d970c4834c169e1b5e8d'), u'line': 2} " > expected_result.log
echo "import pymongo import pprint from pymongo import MongoClient server = \"127.0.0.1\" ; database=\"ibm_test_db\"; collection=\"mongodb_python_driver\";
serverdb=\"mongodb://\" + server + \":27017\" ;
client = MongoClient(serverdb)
db = client[database];
db[collection].drop();
header = {\"company\": \"IBM\", \"project\": \"MongoDB Driver\", \"language\": \"python\", \"version\": \"3.6.1\"};
db[collection].insert_one(header);
for i in range (0, 3): doc = {\"line\": i}; db[collection].insert_one (doc);
for gotdoc in db[collection].find(): pprint.pprint(gotdoc); " > test.py chmod +x test.py
sudo python test.py > test_result.log
sed -i "s/u'_id': ObjectId('[0-9 a-z]*')/'_id'/" expected_result.log sed -i "s/u'_id': ObjectId('[0-9 a-z]*')/'_id'/" test_result.log
diff --ignore-all-space test_result.log expected_result.log
if [ "$?" -eq 0 ]; then echo "OUTPUT FROM DATABASE" cat test_result.log exit 0 else exit 1 fi
